author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Try to improve PU effect on MIP signal for the front layers of HE to study radiation damage in scintillators

#### PR validation:

Tested with 2018 data set

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-alca158 Update the analysis macros for MIP monitoring of HE RadDam
